import React from 'react' import $ from 'jquery' import LeftSide from './LeftSide' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' const Playlist = () => { const [isvis, setisvis] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const md = sessionStorage.getItem('theme') document.body.className = md }, []) return ( <>
{ if(isvis) { $('.leftnav').css("display","none") setisvis(false); } else{ $('.leftnav').css("display","block") setisvis(true); } }}>
{artist.name}

{artist.bio}

{/* */}
) } export default Playlist
